main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Brooklyn, New York, involving a fiery red light in the sky observed for about 5-6 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having no wings and emitted a bright light, brighter than a jet airliner., The sighting occurred about ten days prior to the report., The object showed a delta wing configuration and appeared to be slower than a jet., It was observed to be maneuverable and flashed on and off., The object illuminated the area underneath it temporarily.
sighted object: fiery red light in the sky
witness description: A witness sitting on a roof observed the light.
